Would you like to know more about me?

With a creative and constructive spirit I adapt quickly to new contexts and have a good problem-solving ability. I have leadership skills and am familiar with teamwork. I value time management, but I know how to be productive under pressure. My intention is to constantly evolve and for that I always seek to deepen and update knowledge in several areas.
